Hotel Europark

Set 600 m from Barcelona’s central Passeig de Gracia, Hotel Europark offers a rooftop terrace with outdoor pool.

Each air-conditioned room at the Europark has elegant black and white décor. There is a laptop safe and minibar, as well as a modern bathroom with hairdryer.

Hotel Europark has a café-bar and a breakfast room, where a varied buffet breakfast is served. A free early-morning coffee service is also available.

Location: Eixample
